embedDefaults.title: self-pluto 🪐
embedDefaults.description: Broadcasting from the edge of the solar system! 🚀

helpCommandEmbed.title: self-pluto 🪐
helpCommandEmbed.description:
**💌 Welcome to self-pluto! 💌**

> A lightweight, powerful selfbot client for Discord.

### 📜 Commands:
- `;help` — Displays this help menu.
- `;sendembed` — Sends a test embed for debugging. 🤯
- `;cat` — Sends a random cat image. 🐱
- `;dog` — Sends a random dog image. 🐶
- `;adduser [DISCORD ID]` — Authorize a user to control this client. ✅
- `;deluser [DISCORD ID]` — Remove a user from authorized list. ❌

### 🌐 Links:
- **GitHub:** [self-pluto.xyz](https://github.com/z7rab/self-pluto)
- **Discord:** [dsc.gg/self-pluto](https://discord.gg/)
helpCommandEmbed.credits:
